channel.title: Error message"system cannot find path specified"
channel.description:
It says "system cannot find path specified" when i open the run.bat and " you do not have java installed" when i open the client. this is my first server so please no rude comments. i just installed java and it said that error message help please
all help is appreciated

item.title: Error message"system cannot find path specified"
item.dc:creator: @new2servers new2servers
item.description:
@new2servers wrote:

uhm whats that… =\ sorry im really stupid [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 25, 2009, 08:51:17 am[/size][hr]ok i figured out what environmental variables were but could someone help me set those cause theres a tutorial but the verson of java they have is 6.0 and i have 6.17

Read full topic
item.source: Error message"system cannot find path specified"

item.title: Error message"system cannot find path specified"

item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

You’re environment variables are not set.
